verses.content: Chun, Josef naupa Manasse thla, Manasse naupa Makir, ama nau Gilead, ama nau Hepher naupa Zelophehad naunuhmeihai chu an hung a; a naunuhmeihai hming chu Mahla, Noa, Hogla, Milka le Tirza an nih.
Intuokna puon in kawtkhârah Mosie le thiempu Eleazar le mi lienhai le pungkhâwm po pohai hmaa chun an va ngîr a,
“Thlalêra khan kan pa a thih a, LALPA thaw dinga pungkhâwm pâwl, Kora pâwla khan a ṭhang ve nawh a, nisienlakhawm, ama suol leiin a thih a, naupasal khawm a nei nawh a.
Nau pasal nei naw lei elin ieng- dingin am kan pa hming chu a thlahai laia chun bo el a ta? Kan pa unauhai lai chanvo mi pe ve ro,” an ta.
Mosie chun an thu chu LALPA hmaah ân tlun a.
LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,
“Zelophehad naunuhai chu an indik a nih; an pa chanvo chu i pêk ding a nih.
Chun, Israel thlahai kuomah chun, ‘Mi naupasal nei loa a thi chun a ro chu a naunuhmei in pêk ding a nih.
Nau nuhmei a nei naw chun a ro chu a unaupahai in pêk ding a nih.
Unaupahai khawm a nei naw chun a ro chu a pa unaupahai in pêk ding a nih.

Chun, a pain unaupahai a nei naw chun a ro chu a laibung inhnai puitak pêng in ta, ama chun in- khâwm a tih, chun, LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk angin Israel thlahai ta dingin dân thupêk nghet nîng a tih,’ tiin hril rawh,” tiin.
LALPA chun Mosie kuomah, “Abarim tlânga khin hang fe la, Israel thlahai ka pêk ding ram chu hang thlîr rawh.
Chun, i hang hmu zo chun i unaupa Aron chu a chipuihai kuomah ṭhuoi a ni ang bawkin nang khawm ṭhuoi ni tâng i tih.
Zin thlalêra pungkhâwmhai an chier laia an mithmuah tuia khan mi chawimawi dinga ka thupêk che kala i hel lei khan,” a ta. (Chuong chu Zin thlalêra Kadesa Meriba tuiahai chun a nih).
Chun, Mosien LALPA a biek a,
“LALPA, tisa po po thlarauhai Pathien chun pungkhâwmhai chunga chun hotu ruot sienla,
LALPA mi pungkhâwmhai chu vêngtu nei lo berâm anga an um nawna dingin an hmaa suok le lût a, anni ṭhuoi suoka ṭhuoi lûttu dingin,” tiin.
Chun, LALPAIN Mosie kuom- ah, “Nun naupa mi lungril neitak Josua chu ṭhuoi la, a chungah i kut innghat la,
thiempu Eleazar le pung- khâwmhai hmaa chun inngîrtir la, an mithmua chun thuneina pe rawh.
Chun, Israel thla pungkhâwm- hai po poin a thu an âwi theina dingin a chungah i thuneina aṭhen inhlân rawh.

Chuongchun, ama chu thiempu Eleazar hmaa chun ngîr a ta, ama chun LALPA hmaah Urimin thu la pêk a ta, a thuin suok an ta, a thuin lût an ta, ama le Israel thla po pohai, pungkhâwmhai po po leh,” a ta.
Mosie chun LALPA thupêk ang chun a thawh a, Josua chu a ṭhuoi a, Eleazar le pungkhâwmhai po po hmaa chun ân ngîrtir a;
chun, a chungah kut ân nghat a, Mosie hmanga LALPAIN a hril ang khan thuneina a pêk tah a.
